name: Brandon Nguyen
summary: Recent graduate with a Bachelor of Applied Technology in Cybersecurity and a strong foundation in network security, risk management, and incident response. Proven ability to lead teams, manage operations, and drive efficiency through process improvement. Demonstrates a strong ability to learn, adapt, and contribute to team success.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.context: Cybersecurity coursework and emerging threats risk assessment project

skills.name: Leadership
skills.context: Supervised teams of 5-10 people across multiple roles

skills.name: Process Optimization
skills.context: Implemented processes resulting in 124% sales increase

skills.name: Regulatory Compliance
skills.context: Maintained compliance with environmental regulations and NIST standards

experience.title: Major Sales Associate
responsibilities: Setup, operate, and maintain major electronics including laptops, PCs, and TVs
Diagnose and resolve issues in electronic systems and components
Design and maintain the digital feed that is broadcast across the warehouse through a series of signal repeaters using POE technology

experience.title: Supervisor
responsibilities: Supervised daily operations for a team of five to ensure member safety and operational efficiency
Maintained documents, records, and certifications to ensure compliance with state and local environmental regulations
accomplishments: Developed and implemented processes to enhance safety and streamline operations, resulting in a 124% increase in sales during COVID-19

experience.title: Tire Center Lead
responsibilities: Managed a team of ten in a fast-paced, high-volume service environment, emphasizing leadership, task delegation, and team coordination
Enforced safety protocols through structured inspection and documentation

experience.title: Tire Installer
responsibilities: Provided responsive, solution-focused service to members, demonstrating strong communication skills and the ability to troubleshoot issues effectively
Maintained and operated specialized equipment with strict adherence to safety protocols and operational procedures

experience.title: Front-End Assistant
responsibilities: Delivered exceptional front-line service while adapting quickly to support multiple departments
Demonstrated strong attention to detail while handling transactions with accuracy and efficiency
